overview:
Guy Mucklow is CEO of Postcode Anywhere.com.

Guy’s career began with a ten-year stint as a fund manager at Invesco Plc, where he developed a passion for software through his responsibility for US technology investments. Before founding Postcode Anywhere, Guy worked for the family property business, A&J Mucklow Group Plc.

Inspired by his entrepreneurial grandfather, without whom he says he would probably still be making nails in the Black Country, Guy left at the height of the dotcom boom to realise a lifelong ambition to establish and manage his own company.

He co-founded Postcode Anywhere with Jamie Turner in 2001, when they pioneered the internet-hosted “what’s my postcode” look-up technology that today powers website forms and in-house applications across the globe.

Guy is a chartered financial analyst, chartered secretary and holds an MBA. A passionate follower of Worcester Rugby Club and sometime golfer, he is married with three children.

Postcode Anywhere is now regarded as the leader in the web services space in the UK and is rapidly gaining market share overseas.

The company currently has over 8,000 customers worldwide ranging from Fortune 500 businesses and government agencies to ‘one man bands,’ where the exceptionally low entry cost and simple transactional, no-commitment licensing model of its data capture, cleansing and enhancement solutions, have helped to fuel interest.

The company has been widely recognized for its phenomenal growth and groundbreaking technologies, winning many national and industry-specific awards.
